            boolean circle,

        Creates a new instance of Boss
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate
        y - Y-coordinate
        w - Width of the hitbox
        h - Height of the hitbox
        circle - If the hitbox is a circle
        stageNum - the stage number of the Boss
